name: Create customer lead for with cifNotepadFormat of IntrestedIn+Note and noteText greater than 60 characters

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000933079696000"

When I create a lead for a customer with values:
| cifKey | directBankingDiallerFlag | scheduleDate | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | contactMethod | immediateClose | noteText | cifNotepadFormat | customerPhoneNumber |
| 0100000933079696000 | false | next_week | 12345 | Current Account | Staff Assist Interview | false | Test Note | IntrestedIn+Note | 0871234567 |

children.description: Create lead capture: | cifKey | directBankingDiallerFlag | scheduleDate | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | contactMethod | immediateClose | noteText | cifNotepadFormat | customerPhoneNumber | | 0100000933079696000 | false | next_week | 12345 | Current Account | Staff Assist Interview | false | Test Note | IntrestedIn+Note | 0871234567 |

testSteps.description: Then I should receive back a successful response

title: Create customer lead for with cifNotepadFormat of IntrestedIn+Note and noteText greater than 60 characters
